item.description: Ananthan Ambikairajah is a passionate neuroscientist and educator, who has completed his Bachelor of Science (Neuroscience), and Master of Teaching (Secondary) degrees at the University of New South Wales (UNSW), Sydney. As a result, Ananthan has published research in areas of neuroscience and education. Ananthan currently works with the Centre for Research on Ageing, Health and Wellbeing at the Research School of Population Health within the Australian National University (ANU) and is completing his PhD, which aims to understand how physiological changes after menopause impact the brain.
